subject: Policy Guidelines dated 21.08.2017 on Delegation of Powers; Streamlining in-principle approvals for Change of Scope (COS)/ Reduction in Scope (RIS)- reg.
text: MRdy 754 TTTHNf gferazrot (Tsw5 4Raen & TTHf #RIT4,  IRG TYR) National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways, Government of India) R7ra Tt #i-5 Qa 6, 4az7-10, E1oT, 7f focht 110 075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka; New Delhi-110075 T /Phone 91-11-25074100 / 25074200 NHAI/ Policy Guidelines/ Contract Administration/ 2024 Policy Circular No.9.2.41/ 2024 dated 31st December , 2024 {Decision taken on E-Office File No. NHAI/CMD/Delegation/2023-24 (Comp. No. 226003)} Sub: Policy Guidelines dated 21.08.2017 on Delegation of Powers, Streamlining in-principle approvals for Change of Scope (COS) Reduction in Scope (RIS)- reg: NHAI issued  Policy Circular No_ 9.2.27/2019 dated 23.09.2019 (Annexure-1) for Streaml in-principle approvals for Change of Scope (COS)/ Reduction in Scope (RIS) Para 1 (ii) (c) of aforesaid Policy Circular dated 23.09.2019 states as follows: Though revision of in-principle approved cost of COS/RIS should not happen, but if necessitated due to justifiable reasons, the Competent Authority as indicated below can approve the revisions duly satisfying about the need for such revision: Regional Officer Upto 5% of the cost approved in-principle Member 25% and <15% of cost approved in-principle Chairman Full Powers 2 Reference decision taken by Executive Committee in its 643rd Meeting held on 05.12.2024 against Agenda Item No. 643.01 (ix), the following clarification is issued: (i) DoP issued vide Policy Circular dated 23.09.2019 will apply for each set of items of CoS approved in-principle but not for individual items in such set of CoS items. (ii) It is also clarified that, even after in-principle approval of revised CoS cost as per the DoP mentioned above, CoS order shall be issued by the concerned RO duly satisfying with the quantities and rates: 3. This issues with the approval of Competent Authority. Encl:: As stated above 224 (CS. Sanjay Kumar Patel} General Manager (Coord.)
